branchCategory.name: Miniature
branchCategory.description: <p>The LEP family of mini electric actuators includes a rod type and a slide table type. Each mini electric actuator design is built around the same motors, drives and bodies. Each model is lightweight, less than 1-1/2 lb, and compact enough to fit in the  palm of your hand.  The LAT3 Card Motor miniature electric actuator is about the size of a credit card and is only 9mm high. Positioning repeatability is ±5 &mu;m, with an operating rate of up to 500 cycles per minute.</p>

branchItem.name: Ball Screw Drive
branchItem.description: The LEP family of actuators includes two series, the LEPY rod type and LEPS slide table type. Each is built around the same motors, drives and bodies, with the LEPS differentiated by the attachment of a slide table and linear bearing. Each model is lightweight, less than 1-1/2 lb, and compact enough to fit in the palm of your hand.

branchItem.name: Card Motor
branchItem.description: The LAT3 Card Motor deviates from LE actuators by implementing a unique magnetic linear motor. The ultra-compact body, integrating the recirculating ball guide, motor and encoder, is about the size of a credit card and only 9mm high. Positioning repeatability is ±5 Î¼m, with an operating rate of up to 500 cycles per minute.
